column4: I have updated to the latest Intel gfx driver ... how do i know whether or not I am using it?
the driver name. paste it to pastebin
that is a log file of a failing x server start. you have GM965/GL960 (line 49) but it tries to load some nvidia driver (line 103). are there any other x org log files?
yes there are quite a few ..
pick the file with the newest time stamp. usually that it Xorg.0.log
that is the one i sent you
an nvidia card seems to be configured on your system. it fails loading it and then probably falls back to a generic driver. have you ever had nvidia in your system and removed it?
no, that is the odd thing ... this is a laptop ... Intel graphics card
I removed a bunch of nvidia packages earlier ... and rebooted as well
hmm odd . I would say this could be an X server bug. what ubuntu are yo running?
